releases.body:
- Better shortcuts integration (should no longer have shortcuts linking to older versions, if the issue persists delete the shortcut then reinstall)
- Auto updating should be 100% good to go
- Handle Squirrel installer events correctly

- SSL Support
- Settings menu which includes:
  - Startup on launch option
  - Auto-connect option
- Better file structure
- Ability to open Remote Messages' settings even when window is not maximized
- Ability to quit without needing to right click the app icon -> quit
- Force notifications to be always on (you can disable them from your system's settings)
- Should show up as "Remote Messages" instead of "iOS text client" on task manager
- Added notification support for Windows 8 and 8.1

- Added tunneling support (for using iFunbox/iTunnel)
- Create shortcut when on Windows
- Better error handling when entering incorrect IP, port, or login information.

- Added authentication support
- Made app more pretty by showing a loading indicator when clicking "connect"
- More blank screen fixes

- Fixed issue where a blank screen might occur
- Fixed issue where a random IP might be generated on startup
